name: Magnolia Hat

name: Maiden's Gif Box
description: "Thanks to you, Incubus is finally asking me to attack the Novices together! So nervous, what should I choose for Weapons??"——Gift from Orc Lady, you will gain Confession balloon*20 and chance to get one of the following items: Gold Medal*1, Seed of Mastela*1, Guild's Gift*10, Lightning Chain*2, Mora Coin*1

name: Mailbreaker [2]
description: A slender but pointed awl. It is easy to pierce the armor. If the opponent's defense ability is higher, it can carry out a more aggressive attack.
